member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_PhoneSamples.App
member.summary: Provides application-specific behavior to supplement the default Application class.

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_PhoneSamples.App.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the singleton application object. This is the first line of authored code executed, and as such is the logical equivalent of main() or WinMain().

member.name: F:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_PhoneSamples.App._continuationManager
member.summary: For handling FileOpenPicker.PickSingleFileAndContinue Reference: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/xaml/dn614994.aspx

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_PhoneSamples.App.OnLaunched(Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used when the application is launched to open a specific file, to display search results, and so forth.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_PhoneSamples.App.RootFrame_FirstNavigated(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Restores the content transitions after the app has launched.
member.param: The object where the handler is attached.

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_PhoneSamples.App.OnSuspending(System.Object,Windows.ApplicationModel.SuspendingEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when application execution is being suspended. Application state is saved without knowing whether the application will be terminated or resumed with the contents of memory still intact.
member.param: The source of the suspend request.

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.DynamicLayersInXAML.OnNavigatedTo(Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when this page is about to be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. The Parameter property is typically used to configure the page.

member.summary: Invoked when this page is about to be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. The Parameter property is typically used to configure the page.

member.summary: Invoked when this page is about to be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. The Parameter property is typically used to configure the page.

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.EditAttachments
member.summary: Demonstrates how attachments can be queried and modified from a ServiceFeatureTable and how this type of edit is pushed to the server or canceled.
member.title: Edit Attachments

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.EditAttributes
member.summary: Demonstrates how attributes of a feature can be modified from a ServiceFeatureTable and how this type of edit is pushed to the server or canceled.
member.title: Edit Attributes

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.EditGeometry
member.summary: Demonstrates how geometry of a feature can be modified from a ServiceFeatureTable and how this type of edit is pushed to the server or canceled.
member.title: Edit Geometry

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.OwnershipBasedEditing
member.summary: Demonstrates the ability of feature services to restrict editing operations based on feature ownership. The owner is defined as the user who created the feature. In this example, owners can update or delete their features. Feature not owned by the current user cannot be updated or deleted.
member.title: Ownership-based Editing

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.EditorTracking
member.summary: Demonstrates how Identity Manager is used to log-in a token-secured service to identify the user performing edits on feature and how these edits are pushed to the server or canceled.
member.title: Editor Tracking

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ComputeClassStatistics
member.summary: Demonstrates how to compute class statistics for an image layer and display the results with the Maximum Likelihood Classification renderer rule.
member.title: Compute Class Statistics

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ComputeClassStatistics.#ctor
member.summary: Construct compute class statistics sample control

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.GetSamples
member.summary: Demonstrates using a QueryTask to Query an ArcGISImageServiceLayer to find image tile outlines and display them in a GraphicOverlay. MapOverlay attribute information is displayed for selected tile graphics when they are clicked on the map.
member.title: Get Samples

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.GetSamples.#ctor
member.summary: Construct Get Image Samples sample control

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_DesktopSamples.Samples.Mensuration
member.summary: Demonstrates the use of the mensuration (measure) operations on an ArcGIS image service.
member.title: Mensuration

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_DesktopSamples.Samples.Mensuration.#ctor
member.summary: Construct Mensuration sample control

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.InteractionOptionsSample
member.summary: This sample shows how to change interaction settings that controls the MapView.
member.title: Interaction Options

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.CreateWebMap
member.summary: Shows how to create a new webmap from scratch by adding a Basemap and OperationLayers.
member.title: Create Web Map

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.CreateWebMap.#ctor
member.summary: Construct Create WebMap sample page

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.PortalBasemaps
member.summary: This sample demonstrates how to search for, return, and dynamically use basemaps from ArcGIS Online.
member.title: Basemaps

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.PortalBasemaps.#ctor
member.summary: Construct Portal Basemaps sample control

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_PhoneSamples.Samples.Symbology.Specialized.MessageProcessingSample
member.summary: Sample shows how to read and process Mil2525C message data from XML file.
member.title: Message Processor

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.LocationDisplay
member.summary: Demonstrates use of the location display, and also how to create a custom location provider

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.RandomProvider
member.summary: This is serves as a custom location provider - in this case creating a randomly roaming location for simulating movement, accuracy, speed and heading changes.

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.ProjectionConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Converter for converting a geometry from one projection to another. The input geometry must have a spatial reference defined, and the converter parameter must but the Well-Known ID or the Well-Known text for the output spatial reference.

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_PhoneSamples.Samples.Symbology.Specialized.SymbolDictionarySearchSample
member.summary: Sample shows how to use search the Mil2525C symbol dictionary.
member.title: Symbol Dictionary Search

member.name: T:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.SymbolsAndLabels
member.summary: Shows various types of the more advanced symbol types: Composite and CIM symbology.

member.name: M:ArcGISRuntimeSDKDotNet_StoreSamples.Samples.SymbolsAndLabels.CreateGeometries
member.summary: XAML creation of polygon and polyline geometries are currently not supported, so here they are created in code. Points are generated in the XAML for this sample.
